name: doubtlessly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
used to mean that you are certain that something is true or will happen: This was doubtlessly a major error. Doubtlessly, his loyal supporters will protest at this comment. Synonyms
doubtless
undoubtedly
More examplesFewer examplesCritics will doubtlessly compare this book to The Year of Magical Thinking by Joan Didion.The complexity of this excellent series has doubtlessly contributed to its low audience ratings.They were doubtlessly convinced that their cause was just.You’re doubtlessly aware that excessive debt is a problem for a significant percentage of our population.Doubtlessly, some people will feel uncomfortable with this idea.
